1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Conversion geographic point
5--   from the plane rectangular coordinates @\/n@ @\/x@ @\/y@
6--   to the geographic coordinates @\/latitude@ @\/longtitude@.
7--   This program is based on the method described in
8--   /Kazushige KAWASE, 2011,/
9--   /A More Concise Method of Calculation for the Coordinate/
10--   /Conversion between Geographic and Plane Rectangular/
11--   /Coordinates on the Gauss-KruÌˆger Projection,/
12--   /Bulletin of the Geospatial Information Authority of Japan, 121/.
13--
14module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.GeoDatumJp
15 ( GeoPoint,
16   convDegree, convRadian,
17 ) where
18
19-- | Point in geographic coordinate system.
20type GeoPoint = (Double, Double)
21
22theLat, theLong :: GeoPoint -> Double
23theLat  = fst
24theLong = snd
25
26-- | Convert point in plane rectangular coordinates
27--   to degrees of latitude and longitude.
28--
29--   >>> convDegree 8 (0.0, 0.0)
30--   (35.99999999999999, 138.5)
31--
32convDegree :: Int -> GeoPoint -> GeoPoint
33convDegree coord (x, y) =
34    case convRadian coord (x, y) of
35      (lat, long) -> (lat / s2r / 3600, long / 3600)
36
37-- | Convert point in plane rectangular coordinates
38--   to geographic latitude and longitude.
39--
40--   >>> convRadian 8 (0.0, 0.0)
41--   (0.6283185307179585, 498600.0)
42--
43convRadian :: Int -> GeoPoint -> GeoPoint
44convRadian coord (x, y) = (lat, long) where
45
46    lat = chi + s where
47        chi = asin (sin xi' / cosh eta')
48        s = sum $ map f $ zip [1..] deltaList
49        f (j, delta) = delta * sin (2 * j * chi)
50
51    long = let a2 = atan2 (sinh eta') (cos xi')
52           in 60 * (theLong $ origin !! coord) + a2 / s2r
53
54    eta' = eta - s where
55        s = sum $ map f $ zip [1..] betaList
56        f (j, beta) = let x1 = 2 * j * xi
57                          x2 = 2 * j * eta
58                      in beta * cos x1 * sinh x2
59
60    xi' = xi - s where
61        s = sum $ map f $ zip [1..] betaList
62        f (j, beta) = let x1 = 2 * j * xi
63                          x2 = 2 * j * eta
64                      in beta * sin x1 * cosh x2
65
66    eta = y / ra
67
68    xi  = let l = theLat $ origin !! coord
69          in (x + m0 * meridian (2 * l * 3600 * s2r)) / ra
70
71meridian :: Double -> Double
72meridian phi2 = mer where
73    mer            = anh * (phi2 + s)
74    s              = sum $ zipWith3 p3 c1 c1 c2
75    p3 x y z       = x * y * z
76
77    c1             = reverse $ opList (*) 1 eList1
78    c2             = map c2Calc $ c3
79    c3             = opList2 (/) (*) 2 `map` [e 0, e 1, e 2, e 3, e 4]
80
81    c2Calc c3sub   = phi2 + (sum $ zipWith (*) c3sub tList)
82
83    tList          = map tCalc $ zip [1..10] sList
84    tCalc (l, sl)  = (1 / l - 4 * l) * sl
85
86    sList          = tail $ sCalc 0 (sin phi2)
87    sCalc x y      = x : sCalc y (dc * y - x)
88    dc             = 2 * cos phi2
89
90    e k            = alternate (drop k eList1') ((reverse $ take k eList1') ++ eList2)
91    eList1'        = reverse eList1
92    eList1         = map eCalc1 [1..5]
93    eList2         = map eCalc2 [1..5]
94    eCalc1 k       = 1.5 * n1 / k - n1
95    eCalc2 k       = 1.5 * n1 / (k + 5) - n1
96
97
98-- --------------------------------------------  Parameter
99
100betaList :: [Double]
101betaList =
102    [ (1/2 + (-2/3 + (37/96 + (-1/360 - 81/512 * n1) * n1) * n1) * n1) * n1
103    , (1/48 + (1/15 + (-437/1440 + 46/105 * n1) * n1) * n1) * n2
104    , (17 / 480 + (-37 / 840 - 209 / 4480 * n1) * n1) * n3
105    , (4397 / 161280 - 11 / 504 * n1) * n4
106    , 4583 / 161280 * n5 ]
107
108deltaList :: [Double]
109deltaList =
110    [ (2 + (-2/3 + (-2 + (116/45 + (26/45 - 2854/675 * n1) * n1) * n1) * n1) * n1) * n1
111    , (7/3 + (-8/5 + (-227/45 + (2704/315 + 2323/945 * n1) * n1) * n1) * n1) * n2
112    , (56/15 + (-136/35 + (-1262/105 + 73814/2835 * n1) * n1) * n1) * n3
113    , (4279/630 + (-332/35 - 399572/14175 * n1) * n1) * n4
114    , (4174/315 - 144838/6237 * n1) * n5
115    , 601676/22275 * n6 ]
116
117origin :: [GeoPoint]
118origin = [ (0, 0)
119         , (33, 7770), (33, 7860), (36, 7930), (33, 8010), (36, 8060)
120         , (36, 8160), (36, 8230), (36, 8310), (36, 8390), (40, 8450)
121         , (44, 8415), (44, 8535), (44, 8655), (26, 8520), (26, 7650)
122         , (26, 7440), (26, 7860), (20, 8160), (26, 9240) ]
123
124rf, n1, n2, n3, n4, n5, n6 :: Double
125rf   = 298.257222101
126n1   = 0.5 / (rf - 0.5)
127n2   = n1 * n1
128n3   = n1 * n2
129n4   = n1 * n3
130n5   = n1 * n4
131n6   = n1 * n5
132
133a, m0, s2r, anh, ra :: Double
134a    = 6378137
135m0   = 0.9999
136s2r  = pi / 648000
137anh  = 0.5 * a / (1 + n1)
138ra   = 2 * anh * m0 * (1 + n2 / 4 + n4 / 64)
139
140
141-- --------------------------------------------  Utility
142
143type Op a = a -> a -> a
144
145opList :: Op a -> a -> [a] -> [a]
146opList op = loop where
147    loop p (x:xs) = let px = p `op` x in px : loop px xs
148    loop _ [] = []
149
150opList2 :: Op a -> Op a -> a -> [a] -> [a]
151opList2 op1 op2 = loop1 where
152    loop1 p (x:xs) = let px = p `op1` x in px : loop2 px xs
153    loop1 _ [] = []
154
155    loop2 p (x:xs) = let px = p `op2` x in px : loop1 px xs
156    loop2 _ [] = []
157
158alternate :: [a] -> [a] -> [a]
159alternate (x:xs) (y:ys) = x : y : alternate xs ys
160alternate _ _ = []
